org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2.mwe2impl

Class MessageBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2.mwe2impl.MessageBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageBroker

    public class MessageBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMessageBroker
    The MessageBroker is a singleton class that manages topics and subscriptions.

      void subscribeTo(java.lang.String topicName, ITransformationStep step)
      Subscribes the given transformation step to the Topic whose name matches the @param topicName parameter.

      • removeMessage

        public void removeMessage(java.lang.String topicName,
                 ITransformationStep step,
                 IMessage<?> message)
        Removes the specified message from the specified topic and the specified subscriber queue. It can be used to inform the broker and the topic that the given transformation step has finished processing the specified message, and therefore it is no longer needed.
        Specified by:
        removeMessage in interface IMessageBroker
